name: Planet of Dolls
description:
[Heads Up: This game can get a little bit Spooky / Spoopy in a certain point despite it's Cute Graphic ]

Made for Beginner Circle Jam 3 with the theme of "Different Planet"

Tommorow is Blue's Birthday, and Blue really loves Dolls.

Because of that, Blue's Parents decide to give her a "Trip" to the "Planet of Dolls"

Will her trip be Fun? Cute?  Spoopy?  or...

Features:

- 10 ~ 30 Minutes of Gameplay

- Simple Puzzle-Platformer Gameplay

- Short Narrative / Story

- Space & Dolls!

Controls:

-  [Arrow Keys]  -  Move

-  [Up Arrows]  -  Jump

-  [Z]   -  Shoot / Confirm

Credits:

- Code, Art, Story, & Music by Yas

- Font: Tiny World - Thaleah Fat Fonts

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059

UPDATE V1.01:

- Dialogues are now Skipable 

- Asteroid & Hostile Projectile are Slower now

You can comment down below if you have any Feedback, Critic, or Issues. This will help me to Improve my Skills & Make better Stuff next time.

Thank you for Downloading or Reading.
